Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Jefferson Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem at Jefferson Park.


Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with delays at Pulaski due to a door problem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running with delays at Pulaski due to a door problem.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
